attributes.action: Send Young Gun Criminals to BOOT CAMP - NOT PRISON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The worst mistake possible is to send teenagers caught with guns to prison/jeuvenille etc. These kids need help, authority and discipline. Prison Breeds Criminals. An army style boot camp should be arranged to instill some self worth and responsibilty, they should be shown what guns really do!
After intensive training and endurance testing an educated approach should be taken in engineering, I.T etc to develop job based skills for release. Once rehabilitated they should be let out straight into employment or into the armed forces.

rejection.details:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/militaryschools/
